name: Telenet Group Holding
goal: Telenet specialises in the supply of broadband internet, fixed telephony services and cable television, including content services, to customers throughout Flanders, a part of Brussels and a part of Wallonia over a powerful HFC (hybrid fibre-coax) network.  Under the brand name BASE, the company also offers mobile services across Belgium. Telenet also supplies professional communication services to businesses in Belgium and Luxembourg. Liberty Global is the main shareholder of Telenet.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Digital Agenda
- Digital Single Market
- Copyright reform
- Data Protection
- e-Privacy
- e-Commerce
- Universal service
- State Aid
- Radio Spectrum Policy Programme
- Data Retention
- ICT Research and Development
